TouchEventShiftKey.summary: The read-only shiftKey property of the TouchEvent interface returns a boolean value indicating whether or not the <kbd>shift</kbd> key is enabled when the touch event is created. If this key is enabled, the attribute's value is true. Otherwise, it is false.
TouchEventShiftKey.value: The boolean value true if the <kbd>shift</kbd> key is enabled for this event; and false if the <kbd>shift</kbd> key is not enabled.
